GameDBLocalizedString.Text: 대기실은 각 진찰실, 실험실 및 방사선실에 배치해야 합니다.
진찰실은 간단한 검사 및 치료를 합니다. \n반드시 필요한 직원:의사x1
휴게실은 병원 직원들이 휴식, 공부, 식사를 하는 공간입니다.
접수처는 환자가 방문해 안내를 받으며, 중환자 방문시 우선 순위를 지정하는 공간입니다. 반드시 필요한 직원:간호사-접수원x1
복도는 각 과별로 지정하며, 구역과 장비를 할당하고 자동 조명 및 미화원의 청소 서비스를 사용할 수 있습니다.

STAT실험실은 다양한 진단을 확인하기 위해 검사를 하는 공간입니다. 

반드시 필요한 직원: 
의료 기술자-생화학x1

외과 실험실은 다양한 진단을 확인하기 위해 검사를 하는 공간입니다. 

반드시 필요한 직원: 
의료 기술자-생화학x1

내과 실험실은 다양한 진단을 확인하기 위해 검사를 하는 공간입니다. 

반드시 필요한 직원: 
의료 기술자-생화학x1

정형외과 실험실은 다양한 진단을 확인하기 위해 검사를 하는 공간입니다. 

반드시 필요한 직원: 
의료 기술자-생화학x1

순환기내과 실험실은 다양한 진단을 확인하기 위해 검사를 하는 공간입니다. 

반드시 필요한 직원: 
의료 기술자-생화학x1

신경의학과 실험실은 다양한 진단을 확인하기 위해 검사를 하는 공간입니다. 

반드시 필요한 직원: 
의료 기술자-생화학x1

X-ray실은 피부와 근육아래 구조를 묘사하며, 인체의 여러부분을 X-선 영상을 제공하는 공간입니다. 

반드시 필요한 직원: 
의료 기술자-영상의학과x1

CT는'Computed tomography'(컴퓨터단층촬영실)의 약자로, 고해상도 이미지를 생서하기 위해 정교한 X-선영상을 제공하는 공간입니다. 

반드시 필요한 직원: 
의료 기술자-영상의학과x1

MRI는 'Magnetic resonance imaging'(자기공명영상실)의 약자로, 자기장과 전파 기술을 사용하여 신체의 상세한 이미지영상을 제공하는 공간입니다. 

반드시 필요한 직원: 
의료 기술자-영상의학과x1

CAG실은 'Coronary angiography'(혈관조영실)의 약자로, 신체의 혈관과 기관을 시각화하는 공간입니다. 

반드시 필요한 직원: 
의료 기술자-영상의학과x1

많은 다양한 검사를 하며, 환자를 적절히 의료 감독하는 공간입니다. 

반드시 필요한 직원: 
의사x1(의국 필요)
청소 도구실은 미화원에게 필요한 모든 장비를 보관하는 공간입니다.

초음파 검사실은 특정한 초음파 검사와 치료를 제공하는 공간입니다. 

반드시 필요한 직원: 
의료 기술자-초음파 진단(USG)

초음파 검사실은 특정한 초음파 검사와 치료를 제공하는 공간입니다. 

반드시 필요한 직원: 
의료 기술자-초음파 진단(USG)

초음파 검사실은 특정한 초음파 검사와 치료를 제공하는 공간입니다. 

반드시 필요한 직원: 
의료 기술자-초음파 진단(USG)

심장도 검사실은 사람의 심혈관 시스템과 관련된 다양한 검사와 치료를 제공하는 공간입니다. 

반드시 필요한 직원: 
의료 기술자 - 임상 병리사

심장도 검사실은 사람의 심혈관 시스템과 관련된 다양한 검사와 치료를 제공하는 공간입니다. 

반드시 필요한 직원: 
의료 기술자 - 임상 병리사

심장도 검사실은 사람의 심혈관 시스템과 관련된 다양한 검사와 치료를 제공하는 공간입니다. 

반드시 필요한 직원: 
의료 기술자 - 임상 병리사

심장도 검사실은 사람의 심혈관 시스템과 관련된 다양한 검사와 치료를 제공하는 공간입니다. 

반드시 필요한 직원: 
의료 기술자 - 임상 병리사
시신경 검사실은 특정 신경 검사와 치료를 제공하는 공간입니다. \n\n반드시 필요한 직원: \의료 기술자 - 시신경 의학자

중증외상센터는 구급차로 실려 온 응급환자들을 수용해 응급처치를 하는 공간입니다. 

반드시 필요한 직원: 
의사 - 응급 의학x1 
간호사x1 
(의국 및 간호사실 필요)

Diagnostic unit at General Surgery department provides examination and treatment procedures for hospitalized patients. 

Min. Staff requirements: 
1x Doctor 
(Personnel based in On-call room)

Diagnostic unit at Internal medicine department provides examination and treatment procedures for hospitalized patients. 

Min. Staff requirements: 
1x Doctor 
(Personnel based in On-call room)

Diagnostic unit at Orthopaedy department provides examination and treatment procedures for hospitalized patients. 

Min. Staff requirements: 
1x Doctor 
(Personnel based in On-call room)

Diagnostic unit at Cardiology department provides examination and treatment procedures for hospitalized patients. 

Min. Staff requirements: 
1x Doctor 
(Personnel based in On-call room)

Diagnostic unit at Neurology department provides examination and treatment procedures for hospitalized patients. 

Min. Staff requirements: 
1x Doctor 
(Personnel based in On-call room)

간호사실은 모든 간호사들이 각 과 운영을 위해 필요한 공간입니다. 

반드시 필요한 직원: 
간호사x3
의국은 모든 의사들이 각 과 운영을 위해 필요한 공간입니다. \n\n반드시 필요한 직원: 의사x1

일반 병동은 환자들이 입원을 통해 검사 및 치료를 받으며 지내는 공간입니다. 

반드시 필요한 직원: 
의사x1, 간호사x1 
(의국 및 간호실 필요)

고도의존성치료실은 환자들이 입원을 통해 높은 수준의 치료를 받는 공간입니다.

반드시 필요한 직원: 
의사x1, 간호사x1 
(의국 및 간호실 필요)
집중치료실은 중환자들에게 필요한 치료들을 유지하는 공간입니다. 반드시 필요한 직원:의사x1, 간호사x1(의국 및 간호사실 필요)
외과 진찰실은 외과 환자의 외래 진료를 하는 공간입니다. \n\n반드시 필요한 직원:의사x1
내과 진찰실은 내과 환자의 외래 진료를 하는 공간입니다. \n\n반드시 필요한 직원:의사x1
정형외과과 진찰실은 정형외과 환자의 외래 진료를 하는 공간입니다. \n\n반드시 필요한 직원:의사x1
순환기내과 진찰실은 순환기내과 환자의 외래 진료를 하는 공간입니다. \n\n반드시 필요한 직원:의사x1
신경의학과 진찰실은 신경의학과 환자의 외래 진료를 하는 공간입니다. \n\n반드시 필요한 직원:의사x1

모든 수술 절차를 위해 수술 장비들이 완벽히 갖춰진 공간입니다. 

반드시 필요한 직원: 
의사 - 수술전문의사x1 
의사 - 수술보조x1 
마취전문의사x1 
수술전문간호사x1 
간호사x1 
(의국 및 간호실 필요)
Chair for waiting rooms and for the reception, it can be also attached to dining tables.
Stool is a small work chair, used in stat lab or optionally in offices.
Office chair is the basic work chair for staff, can be attached to office desks.
Fancy chair for waiting rooms and for the reception, it can be also attached to dining tables.
A decoration and a distraction for bored patients.
A decoration and a distraction for bored patients.
A decoration and a distraction for bored patients.
A decoration and a distraction for bored patients.
A decoration and a distraction for bored patients.
A decoration and a distraction for bored patients.
A decoration and a distraction for bored patients.
A decoration and a distraction for bored patients.
A decoration and a distraction for bored patients.
Info TV works together with a Queue machine. In a waiting room this system provides smoother patient flow to adjacent rooms.
Hand dryer lets patients dry their hands in restrooms.
Coffee table is a small decorative object, TVs or radios can be placed on top of it.
Bucket cart for janitors, who take it with them when cleaning different areas.
Water dispenser provides refreshment for patients and staff.
Queue machine works together with one or more info TVs. In a waiting room this system provides smoother patient flow to adjacent rooms.
A shelf creates a workspace and stores all needed equipment for one janitor.
Bookcase with medical journals lets staff study and improve in their spare time.
Vending machine provides food for patients and staff, snacks sold to patients are a source of income.
Examination lamp for offices and exam units.
PC creates a workspace for one employee, can be placed on work desks or reception desks.
TV can be used in common rooms or offices to keep staff entertained during their free time.
Radio can be used in common rooms or offices to keep staff entertained during their free time.
Printer is used to print prescriptions. Paper holder is a cheaper alternative.
Paper holder is used to write prescriptions by hand. Printer is a more efficient alternative.
A decoration, other objects can be placed on top.
A decoration, kitchen sink and other small objects can be placed on top.
A decoration, other objects can be placed on top.
Kitchen sink for washing hands and equipment.
A decoration, other objects can be placed on top.
A decoration and a light source.
X-ray viewer for examining X-ray images.
Control panel for the X-ray machine.
Mandatory equipment for all rooms where examinations and treatment procedures take place.
Mandatory equipment for all rooms where examinations and treatment procedures take place.
Mandatory equipment for receptions. A PC placed on top will create a workspace for one receptionist nurse.
Mandatory equipment for receptions. A PC placed on top will create a workspace for one receptionist nurse.
Mandatory equipment for receptions. A PC placed on top will create a workspace for one receptionist nurse.
Mandatory equipment for labs, it is used to wash laboratory glassware.
Microscope is mandatory equipment of labs. It is used to analyze a wide range of microbiological cultivations.
Trash bin for safe disposal of biological material.
Mandatory equipment of labs, it is used to prepare different samples.
Mandatory equipment of labs. It provides a wide spectrum of blood sample analysis methods.
Mandatory equipment of labs, used for preparing blood samples in different tests.
RIA or Radio-immunoassay is mandatory equipment of labs, it measures different antigen concentrations.
Sample storage is used for storing various biological samples.
An outdoor decoration and source of light.
A decoration, other objects can be placed on top.
Automatic disinfectant dispenser can substitute a sink.
Bedside cabinet can be attached to hospital bed.
Bed socket can be attached to hospital bed.
A decoration to provide some level of privacy for patients.
Mandatory equipment for all rooms where examinations and treatment procedures take place.
Mandatory equipment for all rooms where examinations and treatment procedures take place.
Mobile workstation provides mobile workspace for doctors in certain rooms.
Life monitor controls vital signs of patients.
Defibrillator is used for restoration of normal heart rhythm.
Ceiling-mounted medical lights that are mandatory for every operating room.
Special Ultrasonography equipment for Emergency and ICU usage.
Equipment used during surgeries to induce general anesthesia and to monitor patient's vital signs.
Advanced model of Life monitor to control patient's vital signs.
Wall-mounted defibrillator is used for restoration of normal heart rhythm.
Stainless steel stand provides space for various equipment that can be placed on top.
Mechanical ventilator provides artificial ventilation to patients.
Glassware is mandatory equipment of labs, it is used to prepare different samples.
Radiology viewer is used to analyze radiodiagnostic images.
Mandatory equipment for operating rooms. It provides suction of various body fluids during surgeries.
Surgery instruments are mandatory to provide any kind of surgery.
Electrocautery machine is used to remove tissues or seal blood vessels during surgeries.
A table to place Surgical instruments on.
Scrubs shelf contains special surgical clothes and suits.
Scrubs shelf contains special surgical clothes and suits.
Warming cabinet warms blankets, intravenous and surgical irrigation fluids.
Warming cabinet warms blankets, intravenous and surgical irrigation fluids.
Scrubbing sink is essential mandatory equipment used for pre-surgical preparations.
Scrubs shelf contains special surgical clothes and suits.
Trash bin for safe disposal of biological material.
Ultrasonograph is mandatory equipment for Diagnostic sonography unit.
Dialysis machine is mandatory equipment for various rooms, can be used for dialysis or plasmapheresis.
Electroencephalograph is special mandatory equipment that records electrical patterns in human brain.
Elastograph is special mandatory equipment that is used for measuring elastic properties and stiffness of soft tissues.
Small table to place various equipment on.
Small table to place various equipment on.
Tonometer is special equipment used for measuring intraocular pressure.
Audiometer is used to determine certain level of ones hearing functions.
CRP scan is quick blood test, measuring concentration of C-reactive protein.
Spirometer measures ventilation, volume of inspired and expired air.
Extracorporeal shockwave therapy is mainly used as a non-invasive treatment of kidney stones.
Electromyograph is used to measure electrical signals in muscles.
Multi-purpose lab equipment used to analyze various biological substances and samples.
Stool analyzer is special lab equipment used to analyze human stool samples.
Laboratory equipment for analyzing DNA polymerase.
Electrocardiograph is used to measure electrical activity of the heart.
Campimeter is used to detect dysfunction in central or peripheral vision.
A source of food for hospitalized patients.
A set of instruments for different eye tests.
Wall decal.\nNote: Red cross is a protected symbol of The Red Cross (ICRC) and can't be included.
Note: when built, elevator gets automatically placed on all floors.
Objects that need to be attached to walls can be also attached to pillars.
Objects that need to be attached to walls can be also attached to pillars.
Chairs can be attached to dining tables. This is the place where staff eat their meals.
Examination table is mandatory equipment for various offices and units, most examinations are performed here.
Bench provides two seats for patients in waiting rooms or at the reception.
Sofa can be placed in common rooms or offices and is used by staff to relax, read books and enjoy their spare time.
Office desk is mandatory equipment of for various offices and rooms. PC placed on top creates a workspace for one employee.
Lab desk is mandatory equipment of labs, used as support for most of the laboratory instruments.
Basic hospital bed suitable for various inpatient wards.
Modern hospital bed provides more comfort for patients.
A stretcher used to transport immobile patients.
Mandatory equipment for all operating rooms.
Office desk is mandatory equipment for various offices and rooms. PC placed on top creates a workspace for one employee.
Purchasing an ambulance gives access to challenging critical cases.
X-ray machine is mandatory equipment for X-ray rooms. Needs to be controlled by an X-ray control panel, placed in the same room.
Computed tomography scan is diagnostic imaging method/technique that creates detailed images of internal organs, tissues, blood vessels.
Magnetic resonance imaging creates detailed images of the body using magnetic field and radio waves technique.
Angiography machine provides technique also called arteriography that visualize inside of the blood vessels and organs of the body.

can be placed here but will block access to another object.
needs to be attached to another object.
can't be attached to this type of object.
needs to be placed on a wall.
can't be placed outside of hospital property.
can be placed here, but won't be usable.
can be placed here, with extra cost for foundations.
is not allowed at the active department.
can't be placed this close to walls.
Delete rooms by clicking any tile they cover.
Decorating flower for offices and waiting rooms.
Coffe machine, reduces hunger and exhaustion.
Smaller street lamp, suitable for pathways.
Mandatory equipment for receptions. A PC placed on top will create a workspace for one receptionist nurse.
X-ray machine is mandatory equipment for X-ray rooms. Needs to be controlled by an X-ray control panel, placed in the same room.
Computed tomography scan is diagnostic imaging method/technique that creates detailed images of internal organs, tissues, blood vessels.
Magnetic resonance imaging creates detailed images of the body using magnetic field and radio waves technique.
